trustfund:
TF050182-DUTCH COFINANCING, GEORGIA -
            SAC 3, 2ND TRANCHE,TF037721-ECA REGION - TELECOMMUNICATIONS,TF036039-ECA REGION - ECA BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Structural Adjustment Credit
            Project supports the implementation of the Georgian
            Government's reform program to reduce macroeconomic
            imbalances, and to provide an adequate incentive structure
            for private sector development. The program includes
            measures to 1) strengthen fiscal performance while lessening
            the adverse impact of stabilization on the poor by ensuring
            budgetary provisions for basic health care, education, and
            social protection; 2) improve legislation and regulatory
            framework favorable to private sector growth; and 3)
            complete the process of ownership change and market
            liberalization. The Credit will be disbursed in three tranches.
